shortdesc.ph: Share the screen by specifying the display ID.

section.p: Share a screen or part of the screen. The user needs to specify the ID of the screen they want to share in this method.

ul.li: This method is for macOS only.
Call this method after joining a channel.

plentry.pd: Specify the ID of the screen to be shared. The developer needs to specify the screen you want to share with this parameter.

@param regionRect (Optional) Sets the relative location of the region to the screen. NULL means sharing the whole screen. Relevant links: If the specified region overruns the screen, the SDK shares only the region within it; if you set width or height as 0, the SDK shares the whole screen.

@param regionRect (Optional) Sets the relative location of the region to the screen. NULL means sharing the whole screen. It consists of the following parameters:
The horizontal offset from the top-left corner.
The vertical offset from the top-left corner.
The width of the region.
The height of the region.
If the specified region overruns the screen, the SDK shares only the region within it; if you set width or height as 0, the SDK shares the whole screen.
